description: Searches across all agreements that a proposer or an acceptor has in AWS Marketplace. The search returns a list of agreements with basic agreement information. The following filter combinations are supported:

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description: The filter name and value pair used to return a specific list of results. The following filters are supported: ResourceIdentifier --- The unique identifier of the resource. ResourceType --- Type of the resource, which is the product ( AmiProduct, ContainerProduct, or SaaSProduct). PartyType --- The party type (either Acceptor or Proposer) of the caller. For agreements where the caller is the proposer, use the Proposer filter. For agreements where the caller is the acceptor, use the Acceptor filter. AcceptorAccountId --- The AWS account ID of the party accepting the agreement terms. OfferId --- The unique identifier of the offer in which the terms are registered in the agreement token. Status --- The current status of the agreement. Values include ACTIVE, ARCHIVED, CANCELLED, EXPIRED, RENEWED, REPLACED, and TERMINATED. BeforeEndTime --- A date used to filter agreements with a date before the endTime of an agreement. AfterEndTime --- A date used to filter agreements with a date after the endTime of an agreement. AgreementType --- The type of agreement. Values include PurchaseAgreement or VendorInsightsAgreement. (dict) --- The filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by various criteria, such as offerId or productId. name (string) --- The name of the filter. values (list) --- The filter value. (string) ---

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: An object that contains the SortBy and SortOrder attributes. sortBy (string) --- The attribute on which the data is grouped, which can be by StartTime and EndTime. The default value is EndTime. sortOrder (string) --- The sorting order, which can be ASCENDING or DESCENDING. The default value is DESCENDING.

nested_params.name: sortBy
nested_params.description: The attribute on which the data is grouped, which can be by StartTime and EndTime. The default value is EndTime.

nested_params.name: sortOrder
nested_params.description: The sorting order, which can be ASCENDING or DESCENDING. The default value is DESCENDING.

nested_items.name: agreementViewSummaries
nested_items.description: A summary of the agreement, including top-level attributes (for example, the agreement ID, version, proposer, and acceptor).

nested_items.name: acceptanceTime
nested_items.description: The date and time that the agreement was accepted.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The AWS account ID of the acceptor.

nested_items.name: agreementId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the agreement.

nested_items.name: agreementType
nested_items.description: The type of agreement. Values are PurchaseAgreement or VendorInsightsAgreement.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the agreement ends. The field is null for pay-as-you-go agreements, which don't have end dates.

nested_items.name: offerId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the offer in AWS Marketplace.

nested_items.name: resources
nested_items.description: The list of resources involved in the agreement.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the resource.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Type of the resource, which is the product. Values include SaaSProduct or AmiProduct.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The AWS account ID of the proposer.

nested_items.name: startTime
nested_items.description: The date and time when the agreement starts.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current status of the agreement.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The token used for pagination. The field is null if there are no more results.
